厯字的基本解释

厯
lì
古同“歴”。

厯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》郎擊切，入錫，來。］
亦作“厯1”。“历2”的繁体字。
(1)推算日月星辰之运行以定岁时节气的方法。
(2)推算历数的人。
(3)指历书。
(4)历运。指帝业。
(5)数目；年数。
(6)年寿；历数。
(7)指堪舆图。
(8)指记事簿。
(9)指宋代给予发解士人初请举者的记事文书。

厯字的康熙字典解释
厯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
厯字的起名意思

暂无。

厯
Basic explanation of words
厯
lì
Gu Tong "shou".
厯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Guangyun" Lang hits and cuts, enters the tin, come. ]
Also known as "厯1". Traditional characters of "历2".
(1) Calculate the movement of the sun, moon and stars to determine the solar terms at the time of the year.
(2) Those who calculate calendar numbers.
(3) Refers to the almanac.
(4) Calendar fortune. Refers to Emperor Industry.
(5) Number; number of years.
(6) Years of life; calendar number.
(7) Refers to the geomancy map.
(8) Refers to the notebook.
(9) Refers to the memoirs of the Song Dynasty given to the first requesters of the scholars.
